text:
deepstreamHub | Berlin, Germany (ONSITE) | Full-time

Join a young but fast growing startup that set out to build a realtime development platform.

We are looking for FullstackJS, Node and Java devs to work on both the open source server https://deepstream.io/ and https://deepstreamhub.com/ - the PaaS

The roles provide an interesting mix of platform and open source development, community interaction, architecture, evangelism and experimenting.

More at https://deepstreamhub.com/careers
